page.title: 08Local Schools
page.content: {5.Special School Boxmoor House is a residential and day special school for up to 63 boys of secondary age.The school caters for boys with emotional,behavioural,social and educational difficulties. {6.Private School Westbrook Hay was founded in 1892 and was moved to its present site in 1963. It is a small independent preparatory school for 7 to 14 year old children, the majority of whom board. {7.Kings School This is a church and Christian school with 210 feepaying children aged between 3 and 16 years.There are 10 qualified teachers and the help of 100 other adults is used on a voluntary basis.The children each work in their own private office following a programmed learning scheme called Accelerated Christian Education.
